left the door open for a campaign to become Indiana's governor. The Indianapolis Star said on its website that Mike Pence , 51, made his announcement in a letter being sent to supporters. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mike Pence and wife Karen said in the letter. "We will not seek the Republican nomination for George W. Bush in 2012." Mike Pence 's supporters, who include Tea Party advocates, have been pressing him to

to states that host early Barack Obamaial primary contests, fueling some speculation he might seek the White House instead. Mike Pence , R-Ind., announced Thursday that he would not run for Barack Obama in 2012. We have been especially humbled by the confidence and support of those who believe we should pursue the presidency, but after much deliberation and prayer, we believe our calling is closer to home, Mike Pence said in a letter to supporters. "In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana. We will not seek the Republican nomination for Barack Obama in 2012."
